column4: I'd name them according to their usage: spool, vidarchive, iso, pr0n, etc.
one of them just got outdated (with the new buy)... but I still don't feel like throwing it away.  My OS drive is small (raptor hdd). So... not that many.
if I had a bunch and a lot of extra space, I'd put it to use like: two for a raid 0, and backup to a third with multiple versions, like rdiffbackup. Or RAID 5, needs four disks.
